name: Unknow Radio
description:
Unknow radio is a game build during the ZooMachine Gamjam 2014 (http://zoomachines.com/).

The subject was "Unknow and Supprise".
The idea was to have radio that track if a hand is close of it.
And enable the player to interact with this radio to play games.


Credit:
Michael Lievens, Sheldon Laforge,Baptiste Remy, Glen de Cauwsemaecker,Eric Wager, Anthony Kozak,Eloi Strée, Celia Betourne.
